sofya.ed.structural
Class Sofya$$Probe$ClassLoader

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.ClassLoader
      sofya.ed.structural.Sofya$$Probe$ClassLoader

public class Sofya$$Probe$ClassLoader
extends java.lang.ClassLoader

The probe class loader is used to load the probe implementation and its dependent classes.

This class loader functions as an isolating class loader. By loading the probe implementation through this class loader, it and all of its dependent classes are loaded in isolation from the main application class loader. Thus classes, including external library classes, required by the probe implementation will not interfere with the loading of any application classes. This prevents undesired interaction between the application and the probe implementation.

This class is included in the bootstrap classpath of a subject program launched by a ProgramEventDispatcher, so that it can be located and used by the bootstrap class loader during initialization of the probe interface.

Version:
11/10/2006
Author:
Alex Kinneer

Field Detail

PRIMARY_SOURCE

public static final java.lang.String PRIMARY_SOURCE
Name of the primary source for probe classes; all attempts to load classes start by searching this source first. This source should be present on the bootstrap classpath.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

SOURCE_PREFIX

public static final java.lang.String SOURCE_PREFIX
Prefix used within the primary source to hide classes from the normal bootstrap class loader; only this class loader knows how to find classes stored with this prefix.
